name: The Lost Shadow
description:
2D Puzzle Platformer

In The Lost Shadow, the main character travels to the lost world, the land of shadows, and the world of light in search of his own memory.

The focus of the game is on using the "Shadow Shift" ability, which allows players to switch between two realities, to solve puzzles.

Project Status : Archived
